net.ltgt.mid.bpi
Class BpiRaster

java.lang.Object
  net.ltgt.mid.bpi.BpiRaster
public final class BpiRaster
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a BPI raster consisting of the image size and raw pixel data.

Author:
Thomas Broyer
See Also:
BpiDecoder.readRaster()
